TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WebPartVerbsEventHandler(object sender, WebPartVerbsEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed WebPartVerbsEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub WebPartVerbsEventHandler(sender As Object, e As WebPartVerbsEventArgs)
public delegate void WebPartVerbsEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, WebPartVerbsEventArgs ^ e);
type WebPartVerbsEventHandler = delegate of obj * WebPartVerbsEventArgs -> unit

span.span: Represents the delegate for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用來指定叫用的方法，以回應事件，為衍生自區域建立的 Web 組件動詞命令時，就會發生類別。The class is used to specify the methods that are invoked in response to a event, which occurs when the Web Parts verbs are created for a zone that derives from the class. Web 組件動詞代表使用者可以在 Web 組件頁面上，例如最小化、 關閉或還原的控制項; 使用者介面 (UI) 中執行的動作將控制項加入頁面的或取消動作。Web Parts verbs represent actions that users can perform in the user interface (UI) of a Web Parts page, such as minimizing, closing, or restoring controls; adding controls to a page; or canceling an action. 動詞命令可以出現在頁首和頁尾區域的區域中，而且有 Web 組件控制項集合中，所提供的標準動詞命令和開發人員可以新增的自訂動詞命令。Verbs can appear in both the header and footer areas of a zone, and there are both standard verbs provided with the Web Parts control set, and custom verbs that can be added by developers. 動詞由在 UI 中的可點按的物件，您可以設定要顯示為超連結、 影像或按鈕，使用屬性。A verb is represented in the UI by a clickable object, which you can set to appear as a hyperlink, an image, or a button, by using the property. A區域才會提供一組標準的 Web 組件控制項的動詞命令功能表中呈現的動詞命令。A zone provides a standard set of verbs that get rendered in a Web Parts control's verbs menu. 自訂的 Web 組件區域或在 Web 組件的區域時，Web 組件控制項可以加入其他動詞命令功能表。A custom Web Parts zone, or a Web Parts control inside a Web Parts zone, can add additional verbs to the menu. Web 組件區域中的控制項可以加入至控制項的動詞命令功能表動詞命令藉由繼承自基底類別並覆寫屬性。A control in a Web Parts zone can add verbs to the control's verbs menu by inheriting from the base class and overriding the property. 如果控制項不是繼承自基底類別，您可以藉由實作加入新的動詞介面，並再覆寫集合。If the control does not inherit from the base class, you can add a new verb by implementing the interface, and then overriding the collection. 受保護方法可讓衍生的類別覆寫事件，而不將委派附加至它。The protected method allows derived classes to override the event without attaching a delegate to it. 在衍生的類別必須一律呼叫基底類別，以確保已註冊的委派收到事件的方法。A derived class must always call the method of the base class to ensure that registered delegates receive the event.
